channel.title: CVE Feed for Ghost Foundation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ghost Foundation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-43441|2024-08-01T16:05:13.556Z -- ghost%20foundation -- node-sqlite3
item.description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the Statement Bindings functionality of Ghost Foundation node-sqlite3 5.1.1. A specially-crafted Javascript file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-34559|2024-07-17T14:21:16.050Z -- ghost%20foundation -- ghost
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Ghost Foundation Ghost.This issue affects Ghost: from n/a through 1.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-34559|2024-05-09T12:03:01.037Z -- ghost%20foundation -- ghost
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Ghost Foundation Ghost.This issue affects Ghost: from n/a through 1.4.0.
